scripts.i: npm run install.env && npm run install.htaccess && npm run install.wordpress && npm run install.theme
scripts.install.hosts: echo 'Adding wordpress-playground.lotsof.local in hosts' && sudo -- sh -c -e "grep -qxF '127.0.0.1 wordpress-playground.lotsof.local' /etc/hosts || echo '127.0.0.1 wordpress-playground.lotsof.local' >> /etc/hosts"
scripts.dev: docker compose up & npm run theme.dev
